setting.name: UtilityRangeBargainingModule
setting.codeGeneratorOptions: ConstrainOffersBetween0And1: $ConstrainOffersBetween0And1; InterpretAggressivenessRelativeToOwnUncertainty: $InterpretAggressivenessRelativeToOwnUncertainty; EvolvingRangeUncertaintySettings: $EvolvingRangeUncertaintySettings; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideMin: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideMin; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideMax: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideMax; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideCurvature: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessIterationsOverrideCurvature; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideMin: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideMin; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideMax: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideMax; RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideCurvature: $RangeUncertaintyAggressivenessSmoothingPointsOverrideCurvature; MaxRepetitionsProjectionDecision: $MaxRepetitionsProjectionDecision; FullInformationAboutUtilityFunctions: $FullInformationAboutUtilityFunctions; NegotiateSeparatelyOverProbabilityAndMagnitude: $NegotiateSeparatelyOverProbabilityAndMagnitude; NegotiateProbabilityBeforeMagnitude: $NegotiateProbabilityBeforeMagnitude; PartialSettlementEnforced: $PartialSettlementEnforced; RejectLowProbabilitySettlements: $RejectLowProbabilitySettlements; RejectHighProbabilitySettlements: $RejectHighProbabilitySettlements; LowProbabilityThreshold: $LowProbabilityThreshold; HighProbabilityThreshold: $HighProbabilityThreshold; DivideBargainingIntoMinirounds: $DivideBargainingIntoMinirounds; NumBargainingMinirounds: $NumBargainingMinirounds; ChunkIterationsForRemoting: $ChunkIterationsForRemoting; RemotingCanSeparateFindingAndSmoothing: $RemotingCanSeparateFindingAndSmoothing
